title: Streeterville STUDIO - available July 01st
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
Unique large corner studio in Streeterville (Delaware & Dewitt Pl).
-- Large windows and abundant natural light, flexible floorplan.
-- Unit boast South/West views, eat-in kitchen including granite countertops, lots of closet space including walk-in closet.
-- Gas, water, basic cable included in rent.
-- Building amenities include 24 hour doorman, on-site maintenance staff, laundry, receiving room, bike room, exercise room.
Roof-top deck with breathtaking views of city & lake --
Close to Northwestern hospital, John Hancock, Northwestern & Loyola University downtown campuses, Oak Street beach, bus and train transportation.
Ideal for NU and Loyola students.-- Non-smoking unit.
Unfurnished; able to assist with list of furniture selections (IKEA as shown in photos).
